product_overview: A personal portfolio website designed to showcase an individual's skills, projects, professional experience, and contact information with a modern, interactive, and responsive design.
core_goals: Provide a comprehensive overview of the individual's technical skills and professional background.
Showcase projects with detailed descriptions accessible via interactive modal windows.
Ensure the website is mobile-friendly with responsive navigation and smooth scrolling.
Engage visitors with dynamic visual effects such as animated typing and skills progress bars.
Facilitate easy contact through clearly displayed contact information and social media links.
key_features: Responsive navigation bar optimized for mobile devices with smooth scrolling behavior.
Animated typing effect in the hero section to highlight key roles or skills.
Skills section represented with progress bars visually indicating proficiency levels.
Project modal system enabling visitors to open detailed project descriptions without leaving the main page.
Experience timeline presenting professional history and education in a chronological manner.
Contact section including direct contact details and social media integration.
user_flow_summary: User lands on the homepage and is greeted with an animated typing effect in the hero section.
User navigates through the responsive navigation bar to different sections such as Skills, Projects, and Experience.
User clicks on a project, triggering a modal window to display more detailed information about the selected project.
User scrolls through the skills section observing progress bars indicating proficiency.
User reviews the professional experience timeline to understand the individual's background.
User accesses the contact section to find contact details and social media links for further engagement.
validation_criteria: Website displays correctly and maintains responsiveness across major devices and screen sizes.
Navigation bar functions smoothly with no broken links or unexpected behavior on click and scroll.
Animated typing effect runs seamlessly without performance issues or errors.
Skills progress bars accurately represent skill levels and animate as intended on user scroll.
Project modals open and close properly with relevant and correctly displayed project details.
Experience timeline is properly ordered chronologically and fully visible on all supported devices.
Contact information is accurate, clickable where appropriate, and social media links correctly redirect users to the respective platforms.
